document_data.name: The Black Boot
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Boot''' was a dangerous [[inn]] found in [[Westgate]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: The Black Boot was located near the [[River Bridge]] in the far east section of the city on [[Rivergate Way]].
document_data.Activities: The accommodations of the Black Boot were poor but the prices were cheap, attracting a motley crowd. Brawls and murders were a nightly occurrence here.
